definition: patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu/same as 江南水鄉|江南水乡[Jiang1 nan2 shui3 xiang1]
surname Shui
water/river/liquid/beverage/additional charges or income/(of clothes) classifier for number of washes
country or countryside/native place/home village or town/township (PRC administrative unit)
Erhshui township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan
patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu
Hsiushui township in Changhua county 彰化縣|彰化县[Zhang1 hua4 xian4], Taiwan

sentences.english: Watery town Wuzhen near Jiaxing, Zhejiang is very typical of Jiangnan taste.
sentences.chinese: 浙江嘉兴附近的乌镇，具有浓烈的水乡风味。

sentences.english: Here is the Water Village Style Garden.
sentences.chinese: 我们来到的这个地方，是水乡风情园。

sentences.english: China has many water towns, especially in the Yangtze river delta area.
sentences.chinese: 中国的水城水乡多，尤其是在长三角这个地区。

sentences.english: Wuzhen Water Village style integrity, and maintain a complete pattern of Yangtze River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 乌镇水乡风貌完整，保持了完整的江南水乡格局。

sentences.english: Wuzhen Water Village style integrity, and maintain a complete pattern of Yangtze River Delta.
sentences.chinese: 乌镇水乡风貌完整，保持了完整的江南水乡格局。

sentences.english: Changzhou is a water country of the Jiangnan, canals criss-crossing, bridges legion.
sentences.chinese: 常州为江南水乡，河渠纵横，桥梁众多。

sentences.english: To Chen, these villages by the water were filled with the memories of his youth.
sentences.chinese: 对陈逸飞而言，江南水乡更盛载他的少年回忆。

sentences.english: Suzhou in Jiangsu Province is a city of rivers and canals and also a city of gardens.
sentences.chinese: 江苏的苏州是个水乡也是一个园林城市。

sentences.english: Jiangnan famous ancient town is unique, and it's a beautiful water.
sentences.chinese: 乌镇是江南有名的古镇，同时它是个很美的水乡。

sentences.english: He restarted the creation of oil paintings, including the works depicting the scenery of water villages in Jiangnan.
sentences.chinese: 重新开始油画创作，有江南水乡风光等。

sentences.english: With same dream, and hearts connected together despite being so far apart.
sentences.chinese: 怀揣着共同的梦想，我们心连心暂别水乡。

sentences.english: At the same time, the style and features of canal towns in south China also offer a unique narrative space to the vernacular novels.
sentences.chinese: 同时，江南水乡又为话本小说提供了别致的叙事空间。

sentences.english: In the rivers and lakes, you can often hear the phrase "bag water" argument.
sentences.chinese: 在水乡，你可常听到“皮包水”的说法。

sentences.english: We come from the watery place your people call Venus.
sentences.chinese: 我们来自你们称之为金星的水乡。

definition: patchwork of waterways, esp. in Jiangsu
Zhouzhuang, old canal town between Shanghai and Suzhou, tourist attraction
(lit.) land of fish and rice/(fig.) fertile region/land of milk and honey

south of Changjiang or Yangtze river/south of the lower reaches of Changjiang/often refers to south Jiangsu, south Anhui and north Zhejiang provinces/a province during Qing times/in literature, refers to the sunny south/Gangnam (district in Seoul, South Korea)
picturesque charm/idyllic appeal/poetic grace
(of scenery) stunning/spectacular/picturesque
water from a mountain/mountains and rivers/scenery/landscape
Sansui, Japanese company
Nanxun district of Huzhou city 湖州市[Hu2 zhou1 shi4], Zhejiang
Xihu or West lake (place name)/West Lake in Hangzhou 杭州, Zhejiang/Xihu or Hsihu township in Miaoli county 苗栗縣|苗栗县[Miao2 li4 xian4], northwest Taiwan
facing the water (favored location)
mountain area
misty rain/drizzle

Dianshan Lake between Shanghai Municipality and Jiangsu Province
poetry and pictorial art/work of art combining pictures and poetry
